text: Fixed Bayonets! is a 1951 American Korean War movie directed by Samuel Fuller and is based on the novel Immortal Sergeant by John Brophy. It stars Richard Basehart, Gene Evans, Michael O'Shea, James Dean. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 war movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Samuel Fuller
title: Fixed Bayonets!
